items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Sign up for free, choose your plan, and connect your first integration. Our onboarding guide will walk you through everything. Most users are up and running within 30 minutes.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes! All plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required. Full access to all features. Cancel anytime.

items.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
items.answer: Absolutely. Upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. Changes take effect immediately. We'll prorate any differences.

items.question: What about data security?
items.answer: We use industry-leading encryption, regular security audits, and comply with GDPR, CCPA, and SOC 2. Your data is always protected.

items.question: Do you offer integrations?
items.answer: Yes! We integrate with 500+ apps including Slack, Microsoft Teams, Salesforce, HubSpot, and more. Custom integrations available on Enterprise.

items.question: What support do you offer?
items.answer: Email support on all plans. Professional and Enterprise get priority support. Book time with our team anytime. Check our docs at any time.
